creditline: Gift of Joseph Bellows/Paul M. Hertzmann Inc.
description: portrait of man with curly hair and a small moustache, wearing a dark, shiny garment; man holds a small pad in his PL hand and a pen against his PR cheek
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Stamp and Label

on sheet backing image and on mat backing sheet:  various notes and inscriptions
markings: on mat backing sheet, stamped: [J. GHISLAIN LOOTENS / 1828 CALTAPA AVE. / BROOKLYN, N.Y.]; on mat backing sheet:  BIAS exhibition label
signed: below image on mat, in pencil: [ADOLF FASSBENDER F.R.P.S. J. Ghislain Lootens]
title: Portrait of Adolf Fassbender
